google_reviews.author: Leslie Lyon
google_reviews.review: We rented from Pure for about a year all in all move in was simple and executed well. My partner and I separated and left our lease after one year.  The New Property Manager Celese Thompson made the process very simple for me as I moved out of state and all the things that involves with closing a lease and being co-tenants.  She was so communicative and helpful offering valuable solutions. Highly recommend them and especially Celese.

google_reviews.author: Sarah Kooy
google_reviews.review: Horrible property management. I have been trying to contact them for months about a tree issue and have received no response. So because I live next door to the property that you manage you dont feel like you have no responsibility to respond to my many phone calls and emails? I have heard nothing. I dont know what the homeowners response was to my request. Horrible customer service!

ownerResponse.text:
Sarah,

We do not manage your property nor are you a resident with our company.  
 We received your calls and promptly relayed the details of your tree request to the property owner. However, our role revolves around facilitating communication and passing along information, rather than making decisions on behalf of the property owner.

Ultimately, the decision regarding the requested tree is at the sole discretion of the property owner. We respect their autonomy in such matters and honor their right to make choices aligned
with their preferences and the property's overall vision.

google_reviews.author: Josh Carter
google_reviews.review: Wish I could leave a negative review. This is an absolutely horrible and down right disgusting rental company dont waste your time going through them and dont expect your deposit back soo if you do rent through them just leave the place trashed when you leave. When we moved out of the resident we were ever paying in rent the house should be condemned and we actually left it cleaner than when we moved in and they have the audacity to send me a $100 check out of the $2500 deposit I had to put down to move in to the run down brick house from the 40s that is literally falling apart. Just absolutely ridiculous horrible company

google_reviews.author: Corrmick M
google_reviews.review:
Broken walls that arent attached to floor or ceiling, no keys to a back door that leads to a non secure back yard, days to respond to anything, hot water completely shuts off (no water even comes out randomly), no fans in the bathrooms, they listed my unit as having a bedroom but the bedroom has no windows or fire escapes, broken flooring thats loose and floating off the subfloor, gaps in the floor big enough to get slivers as your foot makes the flooring sag, outdated two prong outlets everywhere, holes drilled through exterior doors and window frames that werent sealed allowing bugs in everywhere, they charge you around $200 in extra fees but cant even be bothered to to provide a secure unit.

The first week I asked calmly about these issues. It took me resorting to outrage to get a response that took twelve days and has yet to solve any issues.  This company is not worth losing your money to, absolutely embarrassing that they call themselves professional but cant even rent a secure unit out.

google_reviews.author: Alyvia Miller
google_reviews.review: As a tenant, working with Ms. Mora was a pleasant experience. Im used to property managers dragging their feet to get anything done, but she got our maintenance request handled quickly and efficiently, and made sure to follow up when the first plumber had not completed all parts of the job!

google_reviews.author: Maria Uchytil
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge has been wonderful to work with. They work with you to make sure all your questions are answered in a timely manner. Especially Leticia has been working with me and I really appreciate her and the entire team.

ownerResponse.text:
We wanted to take a moment to express our sincerest gratitude for your kind words and appreciation for Leading Edge. We are delighted to hear that your experience with us has been nothing short of wonderful.

At Leading Edge, we strive to provide exceptional customer service and ensure that all inquiries are addressed promptly. It brings us great joy to know that our team, particularly Laetitia, has been instrumental in assisting you and providing the support you needed. I will make sure to pass along your appreciation to her and the entire team. We genuinely value your business and the trust you have placed in us. Once again, thank you for your kind words. It is our pleasure to serve you, and we look forward to continuing our partnership with you.

google_reviews.author: Robert Sensel
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge has been exemplary with there services for my rentals for the last two years. So good in fact that I originally planned to only use them for two years, but, the services have been so trouble free with zero issues, I felt a fool to end such a good relationship and chose to continue through the foreseeable future. Kudos to the entire Leading edge team! Thanks for the professionalism and the great service. Any Landloard not using you is loosing money.

ownerResponse.text: Robert, thank you for sharing your kind words.  We really enjoy working with you too!

google_reviews.author: Jeniffer F.
google_reviews.review: I've rented for 1yr 6 months with this company. Had to move because the owner didn't want to rent anymore. It has been over a month and I still haven't received my security deposit and the property is already listed for sale. I've been calling, left messages and no call back to explain what is going on. I visited the office everyday and it's always locked and has a sign saying all managers are in the field. Why would they have an office if they are always on the field, makes no sense. It's very unprofessional that the company does not return my calls or emails to explain what is going on. I've rented from different management companies and I've always gotten my security deposit within a month from the move out date. I am very disappointed with this management company.

google_reviews.author: Normajean Bowen (Nia)
google_reviews.review:
Stacey at Leading Edge Property Management has managed my property for years.  She carefully screens and selects tenants who maintain and care for the property and I have a low turn-over rate. The financial statements are always on time and professionally executed.
She also keeps good track of the home's condition, allowing me to plan in advance for future maintenance needs.
I appreciate and value the peace of mind and stability that I've been able to enjoy due to the great services Stacey and Leading Edge Property Management provide.
I highly recommend this business to any property owner!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Normajean, it has been a pleasure to work with you all these years.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to many more years together!

google_reviews.author: Smith Plumbing
google_reviews.review: We have worked with Leading Edge for a few years in both regular hours and after hours emergency calls. Their team is easy to get ahold of and communicate with. As a contractor its nice to work with another company who has great communication and high customer service standards.

google_reviews.author: Amanda Cronin
google_reviews.review: Stacey is efficient, professional, and kind. I have worked with her in different capacities, and every time she shows an attention to detail and focus that I appreciate immensely. Her responses are punctual and helpful; she goes out of her way to meet her clients' needs. Stacey also has a big heart and is always giving back to her community - this is the cherry on top of her already-stellar services! I'd highly recommend her and her team to anyone in the community.

google_reviews.author: Marc Erickson
google_reviews.review:
Leading Edge and Stacey are awesome! I work in Real Estate and focus on investment strategy. I know there are all types of property managers out there and they are not all equal.

Leading Edge and their team are true professionals and experts in the space, and they combine that expertise with integrity and a willingness to serve the tenants and the owners. You are in great hands with them!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Marc for your kind words! We enjoy working with you too.

google_reviews.author: Megan Breen
google_reviews.review: I have had the pleasure of working with Stacey over the past year and she is THE BEST. No better company to trust with your property. Leading Edge always picks up the phone, has incredible marketing for their listings (best in the area) and truly cares about each of their clients. HIGHLY recommend!

google_reviews.author: Christina Kasner
google_reviews.review: I am the Office Manager for 1-800-GOT-JUNK? Bellevue, Snohomish, Skagit, and Whatcom Counties. After reviewing our records, I noticed we had an outstanding invoice for Leading Edge Property Management. Upon further review, I noticed the Invoice was not automatically sent as it should have been. After reaching out to Laetitia Oosthuizen we were able to get the Invoice submitted for payment! Laetitia was understanding of our systems error and a pleasure to work with. Highly recommend working with Laetitia Oosthuizen and this company!

google_reviews.author: Jon Brady
google_reviews.review: I've had few issues typical in a rented house such as venetian blinds breaking (plastic doesn't last forever), a leaking toilet, a fence that was blown down in a windstorm. Each time I have to say these folks were prompt and courteous with the repairs. At this point I have no concerns giving them 5 stars.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you, Jon, for taking the time to share your positive experience with our company on Google. We are delighted to hear that our team was able to meet your expectations and that you feel confident in awarding us with a five-star rating. We value and appreciate your feedback!

google_reviews.author: Anderson Schulle
google_reviews.review: If you are looking for a property management company who you can trust and who will do what's best for you and your rental property, look no further. Stacey is a professional who cares, and you will notice this throughout her team and how she operates her business. These are people who continuously work on their skill set, processes and knowledge, so that they can provide high quality services. If you are looking for professionals who care, entrust your rentals to Leading Edge Property Management.

google_reviews.author: Abi Wasserman Ortscheid
google_reviews.review: Stacey has been a client of mine for a little while now and I cannot tell you how grateful we are to have her in our family of clients. Her attention to detail and process focused culture for her clients has been a pleasure to serve and I'm looking forward to seeing her continued success for Leading Edge. Highly recommend the entire team at Leading Edge!

google_reviews.author: Corrmick Moran
google_reviews.review: Almost a week and my missing bedroom still hasnt been resolved. They admitted to using false advertising, they know they didnt provide me with the terms of our agreement but they still cant seem to resolve the issue or communicate. Also, they engage in clear review manipulation as if you scroll back many of the new reviews are just from industry folks. This company treats tenants like second class people, fully acknowledging that we in their community are nothing more then products for them to use.

google_reviews.author: Lisa Marie
google_reviews.review: Best property management company I have ever worked with. If I were to ever move back to the area and needed a rental I would 100% reach out to them. Gayle made the application and move-in process easy. Office was always responsive to any inquiries I had during my 18month stay. Super quick with repairs as well, next day turnaround! Thanks Leading Edge for a great experience!!

google_reviews.author: Sweet Bunnee
google_reviews.review: Wish I could give them zero stars, have had nothing but problems since the beginning from falsely advertised unit to the clear evidence there was little to no inspection before renting as most things are broken or poorly constructed. Communication is incredibly slow and poor, they charge a rental package thats supposed to include setting up your utilities but we still had to call the gas company to setup our own gas and then dealt with scary gas and carbon monoxide leaks in the unit due to an ancient valve that shouldnt have even been there and then when replaced wasnt even tightened properly. I could go on and on but honestly Id run the other direction if I saw they were the property managers for any future rentals, will never do business with them again.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi,
We do not have a record of you renting or on any lease with Leading Edge in WA state. We're sorry to hear you've been having challenges with what seems to be the move-in process. Our tenants do indeed have access to the inspection report of the property as well as the utility concierge service. We would be happy to assist you in finding the report and utilizing the concierge service as well as discussing your concerns mentioned. Feel free to use our team email address which is constantly monitored by a team member during our business hours: care@leadingedgerealestate.info

google_reviews.author: Molly S
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge Property Management is amazing! Had a very disappointing experience with a previous property management company and Leading Edge saved the day!!! So thankful to have professionals on our side!!! Dont even waste your time with anyone else... Leading Edge is the BEST, most knowledgeable, professional, always dialed-in, and up-to-date with EVERYTHING!!!

google_reviews.author: Taylor Long
google_reviews.review: I work as a 3rd party vendor for Leading Edge to ensure their tenants are promptly taken care of when experiencing issues in their home. I deal with many different agencies such as Leading Edge, but few are as organized, punctual and concise. It really shows that they truly care about taking care of their tenants in timely fashion. If I owned a property, I would choose Leading Edge to manage it.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Taylor for your kind words.  We do work hard to communicate with all parties when repairs are needed on a property and I'm happy to hear we are doing things right.

google_reviews.author: Bess Wozniak
google_reviews.review: Stacey and her team are the consummate professionals. I've worked with Stacey through the National Association of Residential Property Managers and she is one that is always staying on top of local and national laws and business procedures to keep her company at the top of its class. You really can't go wrong with Stacey and her team!

google_reviews.author: Casey Ross
google_reviews.review: I have rented from Leading Edge for over 2 years. I am so grateful for their service. I have never had a landlord who is so responsive, helpful and communicative from beginning to end! Thank you for being the best and providing a home for our family!

google_reviews.author: Brian Sweeney
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge/Stacey Salyer handles our rental properties and have done a wonderful job. Stacey has always been available with any questions and have always been prompt and professional. I strongly recommend Stacey and Leading Edge

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Brian, we enjoy working with you too!

google_reviews.author: The Hansen's
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge is managing two of our properties.  They produced beautiful pictures and video for the house that was vacant and actively pursued leads for the best tenant.  Gayle has been a star with both homes and appreciate the work she has done, visiting the other home for safety inspections to ensure the home is being well taken care of and in good working order.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your kind words!  We agree that Gayle is a superstar and we're thrilled that you think so too.

google_reviews.author: Casey Miller
google_reviews.review: Extremely professional company that cares about their clients as well as the community. I appreciate working with local business that are invested in making our community a better place to live. I highly recommend Stacey and her team to anyone that wants to work with detail oriented professionals. Owning a rental is one thing, managing tenants is another. Let a professional make sure everyone is taken care of and happy!

google_reviews.author: Chris Hayes
google_reviews.review: I was lucky enough to get in contact with Gayle one of the property managers at this fine organization! I was inquiring about their services they offered and if my organization and theirs would be able to work together and Gayle was remarkably friendly as well as informative and helpful! Im very glad to have gotten in contact with Leading Edge Property Management and Gayle in particular!!

google_reviews.author: Atwan Kwan
google_reviews.review: Trust is my biggest thing when it comes to leasing.... There's just countless potential nightmares that keep me up.... But Leading Edge feels easy with Stacey's personable and Helpful approach. She loves what she does and it gives me full confidence

google_reviews.author: Laura W Wilson
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge PM has been terrific to work with from the start. Knowledgeable, professional, responsive and reliable in everyway. Stacey salyer and the excellent members of her team - Gayle and others - have been helpful with repairs, record keeping, service recommendations and more. Thank you!

google_reviews.author: Vicky Methven - Methven Agency Inc.
google_reviews.review: Working with Stacey is always a pleasure.  I love dealing with people who run their businesses at the top end of their profession...  Level headed, educated professional and leader in the Property Management / RE industry, Stacey never forgets that she is the 1st, 2nd and sometimes 3rd level of protection for her clients investments and she doesn't take it lightly.  Thanks for being such a joy to work with...  Cheers to many years to come.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Vicky, we appreciate your kind words.  Always a pleasure doing business with you!

google_reviews.author: Matt J
google_reviews.review: Very helpful, friendly, professional, and they do care about the tenants... always checking in and just making sure everything is going good. And for any reason any of us may need something fixed, or a question or anything for that reason!!! They are very understanding and very quick to respond to any issues or questions.. definitely recommend looking into leading edge property management...  Thank you all so much at leading edge property management

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Matt! Happy to hear it

google_reviews.author: Heena Khatri
google_reviews.review: I was referred to Stacey by an out of state property manager.  My experience with her has been nothing short of exceptional.  Stacey Salyer is a top notch property management professional and I highly recommend her for managing your real estate investments.  She is not only an industry leader, but dedicates much of her free time and energy to give back to the community and to her peers. If you have an investment property or a whole portfolio of properties, trust me, you've got to give Stacey a call.  You'll save yourself a whole lot of time, energy and frustration.

google_reviews.author: Chris Green
google_reviews.review: After over 9 years of renting through this company I was told I would not be able to rent the property anymore and was given less than 2 months to find another rental. In the 9 plus years of renting from this company they raised rent at every single opportunity they had. Since they fancy themselves as a "virtual company " they can be extremely difficult to reach or speak with in person. They also will force you to participate in several rental programs such as a furnace filter delivery services and others at a monthly expense to you on top of rent. Fair warning if you have pets you will be required to register them through one of their many 3rd party apps you are required to use at a cost to you upon every lease renewal date. You will also be subject to home inspections every 6 months. You will be given a time and date which is non negotiable because there schedule is just so busy. This company is definitely only interested in profiting as much as possible while doing as little as possible in the way of customer service. I would have never rented from this company as long as I have had my Wife and I not loved the location.

google_reviews.author: Bess Wozniak
google_reviews.review: In getting to know Stacey over the past few years, as a fellow professional in the property management industry, I can attest to her professionalism and would highly recommend her. She is dedicated to the betterment of her company and the education of herself and her staff to stay up-to-date on all things happening in real estate and the property management industry.

google_reviews.author: Cori Sieber
google_reviews.review:
Lending Edge used to be wonderful.  Friendly staff.  Until 1 year ago, they raised everyone rent $400.
The day the increase starts Oct 1.  Imagine that!
Oh,  and we have pay for their rents insurance even if your policy is better rents insurance.  They charge you $45 a month to have filter mailed you instead of us buying them for hella cheapier at Walmart, ect. I would never, ever recommend Lending Tree to anyone.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Cori, I tried calling and emailed you to discuss your questions about the rent increase and RBP.  I am happy to talk to you about the rent increase or anything else regarding our programs.  If you do have an equal/or better renters liability policy and name us as Additional Insured, we are opting residents out of that part of our RBP.  Here is more information about that on our site, https://www.edgehomerentals.com/resident-benefits-package.  Feel free to call me back at 425-312-2592, ext. 4, I am happy to talk with you.  Sincerely, Stacey Salyer

google_reviews.author: Brady Roberts
google_reviews.review: Stacey has been a great resource of knowledge for me and always eager to help me with my property managing questions.  As a new investor I know I can rely on Staceys expertise and guidance.  5/5 recommend whether you are managing many properties or just looking to get your foot in the door.

google_reviews.author: Madison Chapman
google_reviews.review: I currently live in California and called Gail Acidera for information on rentals. I got the most wonderful and professional help I have ever received. I highly recommend Leading Edge Property Management. I cannot wait to continue doing business with this company. Gail Deserve a billion kudos for her amazing customer service.

google_reviews.author: Teddy Keezer
google_reviews.review: Maria Mora was very helpful and got my shower working again!

google_reviews.author: David Butler
google_reviews.review: I am a general contractor and have worked with Stacey in the past.  Stacey is a pleasure to work with.  She responds right with questions and is very exact with the scope of work she looking for, making it easier for us to complete projects.  I highly recommend Stacey for any and all of your property management needs

ownerResponse.text: Thank you David, it is always a pleasure to work with you!

google_reviews.author: Jaiden
google_reviews.review: BEWARE OF LEADING EDGE PROPERTY MANAGEMENT. This property management found a legal loop hole to displace my single mom and her 3 kids during the pandemic, stating in a letter that they intend to move into the property themselves within 60 days. Prior to this during their lease, they contacted the management about a septic problem with the house. The management did not send someone out to check the issue and continued to be unresponsive. During the wait our family was able to check the states public records that proved that their property's septic tank had yet to be cleaned for the past 10 years despite the legal requirement. Since this timely septic issue affected every toilet in the house and wasnt resolved, they hired a personal handyman to clean the tank and communicated so. The property management was then responsive, asking for reimbursment for not only "tampering" with the septic tank, but for "tampons" that apparently clogged the tank despite never actually investigating the issue. After moving, the management continues to contact the family about owing money for the carpet, despite already paying the usual carpet cleaning fee. They are putting a single mother in dept. DO NOT lease with this management.

ownerResponse.text:
Hello Jaiden, we did not have a lease with you so we are unable to know what property you are referencing.
It is correct that we did issue several 60 and 90- day notices for clients who either wanted to move back into the rental property they owned or sell it.  We were following the WA State moratorium rules and our clients direction.
We do welcome the leaseholder to contact us directly about any questions they may have had during their tenancy.
Thank you.

google_reviews.author: Samuel Borthwick
google_reviews.review: Stacey and her team are amazing! Not only do they run a streamline service for landlords. But she is also consistently researching and staying informed and educating her clients on what new  tenant/landlord laws are coming. For anyone who is looking for the best. Look no further :)

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Samuel for your kind words, we really appreciate it!

google_reviews.author: Leslie Lyon
google_reviews.review: We had such a seamless process and are so grateful for Gabby and the team at Lead Edge! Highly recommend for anyone moving to or within the area.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you, Leslie! We are happy our application/move in process was seamless for you.  Thank you for your kind words and we agree that Gabby is awesome.

google_reviews.author: Robert Melvin
google_reviews.review:
Very professional, prompt and courteous.
Gayle has supplied the face of zLeading
Edge-very good
Gayle is the third property manager I
have had for this property-no names
This company took about 4 months
to turn a vacancy on this unit-and left
behind appliances not functioning.
The next guy started well but indealing
with this move out he seemed to lose
prespective-he is gone.
Gayle seems to be doing very well
,and I have no question she will continue.

google_reviews.author: Anonymous
google_reviews.review: Madison was really on top of things. Great communication and if she wasnt available, she set us up with someone who was. Great customer service and helped me out a ton. She was very sweet and sincere. Ill update more once I get a reply on the maintenance end.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Kevin for your kind words about your experience with Leading Edge.  We are happy to hear Madison provided excellent customer service during your move in process.

google_reviews.author: Amanda Vanweerdhuizen
google_reviews.review: Fees fees fees, we rented from remax for 7 years when they switched to leading edge, first they sent us a new "lease" which was only month to month so no security of a stable home or amount of paying rent. Then the lease had fee upon fee which most just said "going rate" so to rekey 1 door cost 97 dollars I soon found out... 45 dollar benefits package that is no benefit just more money in their pockets. Also they do follow guidelines and laws sure, upped our rent 800dollars as soon as they could after covid restrictions were lifted, there's no limit on raising amounts in wa state and clearly they enjoy that law!! When I spoke to the owner about the lease and all these new things I didn't sign up for with remax she gave me the run around and when I moved out we paid all of the fees.. But I know of same discussions with other tenants where their lease got changed and those fees would not apply so not sure what made them special... I understand their are bad tenants and landlords get ripped off at times but it's really sad when good tenants then have to pay for it..

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Amanda,

We regret to hear that your experience with us was unsatisfactory. We do our best to be fair to all parties involved and increase rent based on market value. The last rent increase was years ago and no rent increases were allowed in WA state from March 2020 through June 30, 2021.  If you have concerns about your security deposit refund, you may submit a request through our website and we are happy to review your file once again. You can find more information about the process on this link: https://www.edgehomerentals.com/security-deposit.
Feel free to call us back at 425-312-2592 or email us at care@leadingedgerealestate.info. We look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,
Leading Edge Team

google_reviews.author: Miriam W
google_reviews.review:
I have not had a great experience with this company.

They didnt show for an appointment for a house showing and responded with there must be something wrong with the computer system.

The man on the phone did not offer an alternative solution or send someone out right away.

There was also another couple waiting with us with the same appointment, which we thought was odd.

I called again to reschedule and was given a date and time to choose. I chose today at 1:30pm

I just received an email saying I was confirmed for another date and time that is 3 days beyond what I chose. The email didnt reference our appointment today.

There seems to be a lapse in communication and a lack of desire to make good on situations with prospective tenants.

Very disappointed with the lack of ownership and responsibility of this company.

Integrity and honesty are my core values so when something isnt aligned with that, the universe does its job and spins people and companies out of my orbit. This seems to be one of those times.

May this review be helpful for those who need to see it. May this review also act as a reminder to those looking for a new home - keep following your intuitive guidance and gut feelings. If something feels off - it probably is!

google_reviews.author: Bert Stubbs
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge Property Management took care of vetting new tenants and any issues and that arose during their occupancy of my rental property. They did this at a very reasonable cost taking the worry out of being a landlord.

google_reviews.author: Enrique Ortiz
google_reviews.review: As a property owner, I have had zero issues. When ever I have any concerns questions they are answered very promptly.This is a more modern company that has embraced the digital age. Emails are responded to same day and if really needed a phone is also returned. The owner portal allows me to easily keep track of all finances from rental income collected, management fees and any other expenses that arise.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Enrique, it is a pleasure to work with you!

google_reviews.author: Kevin Hagan
google_reviews.review: My furnace quit working and Leading Edge was notified.  They quickly dispatched a service technician on the same day.  I was very pleased with how it was , and how professional and courteous the technician was.  Thank you Leading Edge.

google_reviews.author: James Barrett
google_reviews.review: Stacey and team are great to work with! They always put others first and are focused on delivering an exceptional experience. I highly recommend Leading Edge Property Management!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you James for your kind words, we very much enjoy working with you too!

google_reviews.author: Cole Hockett
google_reviews.review: Leading Edge Property Management is a leader in the property management industry and is a testament to the best things about property management.  They are continuously educating the industry across the country about best practices and genuinely care for their customers and business relationships.  Leading Edge Property Management is the gold standard of what a management company should be.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Cole for your kind words!

google_reviews.author: sal borelli
google_reviews.review: my interactions with leading edge have been with the asst. manager, celese thomson.  being a senior citizen and lacking computer/technology aptitude and skills, celese has been heaven sent.  she is always willing and patiently helps me  navigate the system..... plus she is as pleasant and engaging as one could hope for.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Sal for your kind words! We really enjoy working with you too.

google_reviews.author: christy broughton
google_reviews.review: We are pleased so far with our recent interactions with this property management company. Their interactive website is easy to use to place work orders when needed. They are responsive to emails and messages.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Christy for your kind words, we are happy to hear our team is exceeding your expectations.

google_reviews.author: Samantha Adams
google_reviews.review: I am a previous tenant, and ever since they disconnected my online services I have not been able to get through to an actual person. They take forever to get back to you, I moved out in July but I just got an email this morning from leading edge stating that I owe them rent and the late fee. Now they won't answer my calls.

google_reviews.author: denise Hindman
google_reviews.review: I would give them a negative 10 if I could....they were horrible at fixing issues, they were never there, they never answered the phone. They tried to charge us for issues that were due to the negligence of the owner of the property and would not refund our money when we had to stay in a hotel for 8 days. I would never recommend them to my worst enemy.

google_reviews.author: Jesus Fuentes
google_reviews.review: They are very helpful and knowledgeable with all aspects of the ever changing tenant and landlord laws. Very quick responding to my questions or concerns. Top notch team I highly recommend.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Jesus, it's always a pleasure to work with you!

google_reviews.author: Kings Heating
google_reviews.review: We have enjoyed working with this Stacey at Leading Edge for years. Always pleasant, personable and polite. Prompt response time and always available when we call.- Des

google_reviews.author: Juan Magaa
google_reviews.review: Terrible place to rent from. The landlord switched to these folks within our last 2 years at the rental and they managed to up the rent over $1000 in that time. They started charging all sorts of fees that did not apply to they unit and were the absolute worst at replying to our many inquiries. Long story short this is a money hungry company who does not care about there tenants.

google_reviews.author: Caitlen Richardson
google_reviews.review: They pressure tenants to move out not giving them enough time to find a new place and then threaten eviction if not done properly. Raised rent as much as they could not caring about how the world is right now recovering from Covid. Dont rent through this company

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Caitlen, we do not have a record of you renting or on any lease with Leading Edge in WA state.
We're sorry to hear you are experiencing a challenge in regard to moving with the company you are currently renting through.
At Leading Edge we do  analyze the current market and work with each client to discuss rent increases.  As members of NARPM, we work very hard to follow the WA state landlord tenant laws in regard to all timelines for the notices required to increase rent and/or move.

google_reviews.author: Lena
google_reviews.review:
Awful, when I moved in they hadn't painted, cleaned and the carpets were filthy.  They steadily raised the rates until it was so exorbitant moving out was the only option. Within two weeks of giving the notice to vacate they actively scheduled new showings, EVEN WALKING INTO MY HOME with potential renters, without my consent, without my permission, whilst I'm literally carrying boxes out.  Apparently a text was sufficient to allow themselves the privilege of trespassing and unlawful entry.  I'm not even going to get into the hyper-inflated magical "damage" fees there charging.

F-

google_reviews.review: If I could leave a 0 stars I would. Virtual lead property management group with no urgency to help tenants over the phone. Im very disappointed. Do not expect to get much of your deposit back even if you left the space cleaner than when you moved in.

google_reviews.author: Scott Thompson

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Scott,
We responded to your move out charge inquiry immediately.  We began our Security Deposit Review process and reviewed the move out charges again with the owner.  Per the owners decision, two charges were reversed on your account and a refund check was mailed to you. We thank you for your tenancy and wish you the best in the future.

google_reviews.author: Lupita Aybar
google_reviews.review: The truth is they are a terrible company, I have never had so much stress with companies before, I helped my brother apply, but it is so difficult to contact them because now it is all online, but that is not all when my brother entered the apartment many Things were not working and we tried to talk to them to fix it and they took a few days to go and they fixed things, the stove does not work completely, only three grills work and apart from that they are charging my brother to fix the heating. My brother has been trying to talk to them since last week and they haven't answered yet. That's why I dared to write here because I don't know what to do anymore, I'm desperate. The truth is, I'm not one of the people who writes comments. But I'm tired of being charged for things when they don't even answer you to give you an explanation.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you very much for the generous 5-star rating! We greatly appreciate your feedback and are delighted to have been able to assist you. We sincerely value your support and eagerly anticipate the opportunity to work with you again in the future.
Hi Jason, thank you for 5-star, we are happy to see you enjoy the house you rent from us!
Thank you Charles for the 5-star rating.  We are happy to hear you've been enjoying the service with Leading Edge!

summary.text:
Good

Based on user reviews, PURE Property Management of Washington seems to have had positive interactions with some of its clients, especially in the areas of communication and responsiveness to maintenance requests. For instance, a user appreciated the simple and well-executed move-in procedure and later received effective assistance in managing a lease closure from out of state, signifying the company's willingness to provide solutions to unique tenant situations. Additionally, the prompt and courteous handling of repairs and attention to detail in the application and move-in processes were highlighted as positive experiences, exemplifying the caring approach of the management.

Great

The property management company seems to exceed expectations in terms of their professionalism and quality of services offered to clients. Tenants have praised the management for speedy resolutions to maintenance issues, noting that concerns are often addressed the next day. The process for potential tenants and communication with contractors and vendors is described as easy and certainly standing out compared to average companies. It is also worth mentioning that several reviewers found Leading Edge's staff members, particularly identifiable professionals, to be noteworthy for their exceptional service.

Bad

However, the company has not been without its shortcomings. Users have reported instances of poor customer service, specifically mentioning the failure to respond to multiple communications regarding concerns such as tree issues. Additionally, there are reports of misrepresented property features and inadequate unit security. Tenants have complained about outdated facilities, unresolved issues even after repeated communication, and frustration over what appears to be management's disregard for the comfort and safety of their clients.

Ugly
summary.disclaimer: Pure Property Management of Washington is relatively new to the Bellingham area, having acquired Son-Rise Property management. It is unclear whether Son-Rise simply rebranded, or whether PURE replaced property managers with their own.
